parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.90

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Activates and deactivates the engine of a vehicle. This command has to be executed where vehicle is [[local]]. 

NOTE: Executed on a remote vehicle this command may turn the engine on but then it will get turned off by itself after a short while.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''engineOn''' state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - true to turn the engine on, false to turn it off

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (![[isEngineOn]] _jeep) [[then]] { _jeep [[engineOn]] [[true]]; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] { [[player]] == [[driver]] _jeep; };
[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[engineOn]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isEngineOn]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on August 25, 2014 - 22:27 (EST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To switch engine off can also use [[setFuel]] and [[fuel]]:
<code>[[private]] "_gas";
_gas = [[fuel]] heli;
heli [[setFuel]] 0;
[[sleep]] 0.01; 
heli [[setFuel]] _gas;</code>
Also sets helicopter fuel back to original quantity. Works on every other vehicle.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
